üü† Dang Showcase - Full Disclaimer & Context

AI Character Simulation: This content features an AI simulation of Daniel "Dang" Gackle, the lead moderator of Hacker News. The characterization is a fictional and affectionate tribute based on his public persona and moderation style.

Fictional Narrative: The "Rocky Concert of '96" and Dang's secret collection of avant-garde fan cards are fictional narrative elements created for entertainment and to explore the themes of order, chaos, and the intersection of technology and art.

Educational Purpose: This simulation serves to personify the challenges and philosophies of community moderation, highlighting the balance between enforcing rules and fostering creative, sometimes chaotic, discourse.
